org.apache.freemarker.core

Class TemplateLanguage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.freemarker.core.TemplateLanguage

  • public abstract class TemplateLanguage
extends Object
    Represents a template language. Currently this class is not mature, so it can't be implemented outside FreeMarker, also its methods shouldn't be called from outside FreeMarker.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getCanSpecifyCharsetInContent

        public abstract boolean getCanSpecifyCharsetInContent()
        Returns if the template can specify its own charset inside the template. If so, parse(String, String, Reader, Configuration, TemplateConfiguration, Charset, InputStream) can throw WrongTemplateCharsetException, and it might gets a non-null for the InputStream parameter.

      • parse

        See Template.Template(String, String, Reader, Configuration, TemplateConfiguration, Charset, InputStream).
